name: Jurrassic Measures (elitestratman)
description:
Jurassic times call for Jurassic Measures!

You're a Terminator Model T-R3X sent back in time with one mission: Save. The. Dinosaurs. There's a catch: You run on rhythm - if you can't fire to the beat, the future of your race is doomed.

Watch out for tricky rhythms and meters. The beat won't always be straight notes! 

Bluetooth headphones will work but are NOT recommended. If you are using a pair, it will be important to fine tune your delay in-game. If you find yourself missing beat you thought you hit, head back to the menu and adjust that DELAY!

Soundtrack: https://soundcloud.com/paul-devito-270647719/sets/jurassic-measures

Art Timelapses: 

Originally made for the 2021 Rhythm Jam, but it was pretty busted.

Fixed and updated for the Finish Your Game Jam hosted by the PIGSquad!
